query: Glengarry Games Gravel Run gravel race Maxville

videos.title: Glengarry Highland Games Gravel Run (Gravel Cup Canada)
videos.description:
We had an amazing time in Maxville, Ontario, for the inaugural Glengarry Highland Games Gravel Run! Such an awesome event with gorgeous weather, and a beautiful area for some gravel riding! As always, a big thank you to the Gravel Cup Canada team for organizing an incredible cycling experience for all levels of riders! 

Next event: 

BACK FORTY HIGHLANDER
Black Forty Artisan Cheese
September 7, 2024

LINK IN BIO FOR DETAILS

#gravelcupcanada #cycling #gravelbikes #gravelcycling #ontariocycling #cyclingcanada #Ontario #maxville #giro #kunstadt

videos.title: Graydon Corsi Glengarry Highland Games Gravel Run 2025
videos.description: This video was made with Clipchamp

videos.title: Gravel Cup Canada - Maxville Course Preview
videos.description:
A new event in partnership with the Glengarry Highland Games!

The Glengarry Highlands Gravel Run uses the rolling gravel roads around Maxville in the United Counties of Stormont, Dundas & Glengarry. It then finishes with a 3/4 lap of an oval track in front of the giant covered grandstands in front of hundreds of spectators. With a 40km, 80km, and 120km route to choose from, there is a ride for everyone!

Register now at gravelcup.com! (link in bio)

#cycling #gravebikes #gravelcycling #biking #gravecupcanada #ottawa #maxville #ontario #canada
